result:
<page title="校园牛奶机">
        <status v-if="cards.length < 1" text="暂无卡片" image="../../static/card.png" :buttons="buttons" @buttonTap="handleButtonTap"></status>
        <view v-else>
            <view class='flex margin-left-sm'>
                <view  hover-class="text-green" >
                    <text class='cuIcon-roundadd'></text>
                    <text class="text-df" data-url="../addCard/addCard" @click="handleNavigatorClick">添加卡片</text>
                </view>
                <view  class="margin-left-sm" hover-class="text-green">
                    <text class='cuIcon-unlock'></text>
                    <text class="text-df" @click="handleUnBindCard">解绑卡片</text>
                </view>
            </view>
            <swiper class="card-swiper " :class="!dotStyle?'square-dot':'round-dot'" :indicator-dots="false" :circular="true"
                    :autoplay="false" interval="5000" duration="500" @change="cardSwiper" indicator-color="#8799a3"
                    indicator-active-color="#000000">
                <swiper-item v-for="(item,index) in cards" :key="index" :class="cardCur==index?'cur':''" >
                    <view class="swiper-item padding bg-gray"  :style="'background-image:url('+cardBg[index]+');background-size:cover;'">
                        <view class=" cf ">
                            <view class=' radius fl '>
                                <image src="https://deepand.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/icon/icon-logo-milk.png" mode="aspectFill" style="width: 80rpx;height: 80rpx;" ></image>
                            </view>
                            <view class='text-white radius fr padding-sm text-price-cn'>{{cardInfo.money}}</view>
                        </view>
                        <view class=" cf padding-sm">
                            <view class='text-white radius fl  ' style="letter-spacing: 10upx;"> {{cardInfo.cardno}} </view>
                        </view>
                        <view class=" cf p   text-xs text-white ">
                            <view class=' radius fl padding-sm '>
                                <view>持卡人</view>
                                <view class="padding-left">{{cardInfo.cardname}}</view>
                            </view>
                            <view class='radius fr padding-sm'>
                                <view>卡限额</view>
                                <view class="padding-left">{{`${ cardInfo.daylimitmoney}元/${cardInfo.daylimitcount}次`}}</view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                        <!--                    https://deepand.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/icon/icon-logo-milk.png-->
                        <!--                    <image :src="item.url" mode="aspectFill" v-if="item.type=='image'"></image>-->
                        <!--                    <video :src="item.url" autoplay loop muted :show-play-btn="false" :controls="false" objectFit="cover" v-if="item.type=='video'"></video>-->
                    </view>
                </swiper-item>
            </swiper>
            <view>
                <view class="flex bg-white padding-sm" v-if="false">
                    <view class="flex-sub radius text-center">
                        <button class="cu-btn round bg-green shadow text-sm icon-uploa" @click="handleAddCard">添加卡片</button>
                    </view>
                    <view class="flex-sub radius text-center">
                        <button class="cu-btn round bg-green shadow text-sm" @click="showUnbindModal">解绑卡片</button>
                    </view>
                </view>

                <view class="flex">
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu shadow-lg">
                            <view class="cu-item ">
                                <view class="content">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">卡号</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                        <view class="picker text-grey text-sm">{{cardInfo['cardno']}}</view>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">卡状态</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <view class="cu-tag  round text-xs" :class="colorMap[cardInfo['cardstatus']]" >{{cardInfo['cardstatus']}}</view>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                </view>

                <view class="flex">
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu shadow-lg">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">孩子名称</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <text class="text-grey text-sm">{{cardInfo['cardname']}}</text>
                                    <view class="cu-tag line-green round margin-left-sm text-xs" @click="handleEditName">
                                        修改
                                    </view>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">学校名称</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <text class="text-grey text-sm">{{cardInfo['schoolname']}}</text>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                </view>

                <view class="flex" v-if="false">
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu shadow-lg">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">卡余额</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <text class="text-grey text-sm text-price">{{cardInfo['money']}}</text>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">消费限制</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <text class="text-grey text-sm">{{cardInfo['daylimitmoney']}}</text>
                                    <view class="cu-tag line-green round margin-left-sm text-xs" data-url="../editCard/editCard" @click="handleNavigatorClick" >设置</view>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                </view>


                <view class="flex">
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu shadow-lg">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">昨日消费</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <text class="text-grey text-sm ">{{cardInfo['yesterdayused']}}</text>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                    <view class="flex-sub bg-grey radius">
                        <view class="cu-list menu">
                            <view class="cu-item">
                                <view class="content" data-link="https://github.com/weilanwl/ColorUI">
                                    <text class="icon-attentionfill text-black"></text>
                                    <text class="text-black text-md">今日消费</text>
                                </view>
                                <view class="action">
                                    <text class="text-grey text-sm">{{cardInfo['todayused']}}</text>
                                </view>
                            </view>
                        </view>
                    </view>
                </view>
            </view>

            <view v-if="false" class="header-data padding-sm flex text-center text-grey bg-white shadow-warp">
                <view class="flex flex-sub flex-direction solid-right">
                    <view class="text-md text-blue">8.0元/3次</view>
                    <view class="margin-top-sm text-sm">
                        <text class="icon-favorfill"></text>
                        昨日消费
                    </view>        
                </view>
                <view class="flex flex-sub flex-direction">
                    <view class="text-md text-green">9.0元/4次</view>
                    <view class="margin-top-sm text-sm">
                        <text class="icon-fork"></text>
                        今日消费
                    </view>
                </view>
            </view>

            <scroll-view scroll-y class="page padding-top-lg bg-white">
                <view class="nav-list">
                    <view
                            hover-class="none"
                            :data-data="item"
                            class="nav-li"
                            :class="'bg-'+item.color"
                            :style="[{animation: 'show ' + ((index+1)*0.2+1) + 's 1'}]"

                            v-for="(item,index) in elements"
                            :key="index"
                            @click="handleElementsTap"
                    >
                        <view class="nav-title">{{item.title}}</view>
                        <view class="text-sm">{{item.name}}</view>
                        <text :class="'cuIcon-' + item.icon"></text>
                    </view>
                </view>
                <view class="cu-tabbar-height"></view>
            </scroll-view>

            <modal title="修改名称"  v-model="modalEditName" @onCancel="handleEditNameCancel" @onConfirm="handleEditSubmit">
                <view class="cu-form-group ">
                    <view class="cu-form-group">
                        <view class='title'>备注名称</view>
                        <input class="bg-white radius" @change="handleNameChange" v-model="cardInfo.cardname"    placeholder="请输入孩子姓名"/>
                    </view>
                </view>
            </modal>

<!--            <modal title="解绑卡片"  v-model="modalUnBindCard"  @onConfirm="handleUnBindCard">-->
<!--                是否确认解绑该卡片-->
<!--            </modal>-->
        </view>
    </page>
